Depending on platform, the dialog may not be automatically dismissed because the help that your application provides may need to be relevant to the text shown in this dialog in order to assist the user in making a decision. trans-unit.source: This signal is emitted when the view stops moving due to user interaction or a generated flick(). If a flick was active, this signal will be emitted once the flick stops. If a flick was not active, this signal will be emitted when the user stops dragging - i.e. a mouse or touch release.

trans-unit.source: This signal is emitted when the view stops moving due to user interaction. If a flick was generated, this signal will be emitted once the flick stops. If a flick was not generated, this signal will be emitted when the user stops dragging - i.e. a mouse or touch release.

trans-unit.source: This signal is for advanced use: it is useful when there is more than one MouseArea that is handling input, or when there is a MouseArea inside a Flickable. In the latter case, if you execute some logic in the onPressed signal handler and then start dragging, the Flickable will steal the mouse handling from the MouseArea. In these cases, to reset the logic when the MouseArea has lost the mouse handling to the Flickable, canceled should be handled in addition to released.
trans-unit.target: 这个信号是先进的用途：当有一个以上是很有用鼠标区域正在处理输入，或当有鼠标区域一个内部Flickable。在后一种情况下，如果您在 onPressed 信号处理程序中执行一些逻辑，然后开始拖动，则Flickable将窃取MouseArea中的鼠标处理。在这些情况下，复位时逻辑鼠标区域已经失去了鼠标操作的Flickable， canceled 应在除处理，以释放。

trans-unit.source: This signal is for advanced use: it is useful when there is more than one MultiPointTouchArea that is handling input, or when there is a MultiPointTouchArea inside a Flickable. In the latter case, if you execute some logic in the onPressed signal handler and then start dragging, the Flickable may steal the touch handling from the MultiPointTouchArea. In these cases, to reset the logic when the MultiPointTouchArea has lost the touch handling to the Flickable, canceled should be handled in addition to released.
trans-unit.target: 这个信号是先进的用途：当有一个以上是很有用MultiPointTouchArea正在处理的输入，或当有MultiPointTouchArea一个内部Flickable。在后一种情况下，如果您在 onPressed 信号处理程序中执行某些逻辑然后开始拖动，则Flickable可能会从MultiPointTouchArea窃取触摸处理。在这些情况下，复位时逻辑MultiPointTouchArea已经失去了触摸操作的Flickable， canceled 应在除处理，以释放。

trans-unit.source: This signal is typically used when a MultiPointTouchArea has been nested in a Flickable or another MultiPointTouchArea. When the threshold has been reached and the signal is handled, you can determine whether or not the touch area should grab the current touch points. By default they will not be grabbed; to grab them call gesture.grab(). If the gesture is not grabbed, the nesting Flickable, for example, would also have an opportunity to grab.
trans-unit.target: 当MultiPointTouchArea嵌套在Flickable或另一个MultiPointTouchArea中时，通常使用此信号。达到阈值并处理信号后，您可以确定触摸区域是否应抓住当前触摸点。默认情况下，它们不会被抓住；抓住他们，打电话给 gesture.grab() 。如果未抓住手势，则嵌套Flickable也将有机会抓住。

trans-unit.source: This slot tells QSslSocket to ignore errors during QSslSocket's handshake phase and continue connecting. If you want to continue with the connection even if errors occur during the handshake phase, then you must call this slot, either from a slot connected to sslErrors(), or before the handshake phase. If you don't call this slot, either in response to errors or before the handshake, the connection will be dropped after the sslErrors() signal has been emitted.
trans-unit.target: 该插槽告诉QSslSocket在QSslSocket的握手阶段忽略错误并继续连接。如果即使在握手阶段发生错误也要继续连接，则必须从连接到sslErrors（）的插槽中或在握手阶段之前调用此插槽。如果不响应该错误或在握手之前不调用此插槽，则在发出sslErrors（）信号后将断开连接。

trans-unit.source: This slot tells QSslSocket to ignore errors during QSslSocket's handshake phase and continue connecting. If you want to continue with the connection even if errors occur during the handshake phase, then you must call this slot, either from a slot connected to sslErrors(), or before the handshake phase. If you don't call this slot, either in response to errors or before the handshake, the connection will be dropped after the sslErrors() signal has been emitted.

This slot tells QWebSocket to ignore errors during QWebSocket's handshake phase and continue connecting. If you want to continue with the connection even if errors occur during the handshake phase, then you must call this slot, either from a slot connected to sslErrors(), or before the handshake phase. If you don't call this slot, either in response to errors or before the handshake, the connection will be dropped after the sslErrors() signal has been emitted.
trans-unit.target: 该插槽告诉QWebSocket在QWebSocket的握手阶段忽略错误并继续连接。如果即使在握手阶段发生错误也要继续连接，则必须从连接到sslErrors（）的插槽中或在握手阶段之前调用此插槽。如果不响应此错误或在握手之前不调用此插槽，则在发出sslErrors（）信号后将断开连接。

trans-unit.source: This step applies per-texture UV transformations and bakes them into stand-alone texture coordinate channels.
This step searches all meshes for degenerate primitives and converts them to proper lines or points.
This step searches all meshes for invalid data, such as zeroed normal vectors or invalid UV coords and removes/fixes them. This is intended to get rid of some common exporter errors.
This step searches for duplicate meshes and replaces them with references to the first mesh.
This step will perform a global scale of the model.

This stores an array of values of a given type at adjacent positions in memory. Inserting at the front or in the middle of a vector can be quite slow, because it can lead to large numbers of items having to be moved by one position in memory.
trans-unit.target: 它在内存中相邻的位置存储一个给定类型的值数组。在向量的前面或中间插入可能会很慢,因为它可能会导致大量的项目必须在内存中移动一个位置。

trans-unit.source: This style strategy has been deprecated since Qt 5.15.0. All fonts are OpenGL-compatible by default.
This style strategy has been deprecated since Qt 5.15.0. Use QFontMetrics to retrieve rounded font metrics.

This subclass of QOpenGLFunctions includes the OpenGL ES 3.0, 3.1 and 3.2 functions. These will only work when an OpenGL ES 3.x context, or an OpenGL context of a version containing the functions in question either in core or as extension, is in use. This allows developing GLES 3.x applications in a cross-platform manner: development can happen on a desktop platform with OpenGL 3.x or 4.x, deploying to a true GLES 3.x device later on will require no or minimal changes to the application.
trans-unit.target: QOpenGLFunctions的此子类包括OpenGL ES 3.0、3.1和3.2函数。这些仅在使用OpenGL ES 3.x上下文或包含相关功能的版本的OpenGL上下文时才起作用，该版本包含核心功能或扩展功能。这允许以跨平台方式开发GLES 3.x应用程序：开发可以在具有OpenGL 3.x或4.x的桌面平台上进行，稍后再部署到真正的GLES 3.x设备将不需要或只需进行很少的更改即可。应用程序。

trans-unit.source: This subclass of QOpenGLFunctions includes the OpenGL ES 3.0, 3.1 and 3.2 functions. These will only work when an OpenGL ES 3.x context, or an OpenGL context of a version containing the functions in question either in core or as extension, is in use. This allows developing GLES 3.x applications in a cross-platform manner: development can happen on a desktop platform with OpenGL 3.x or 4.x, deploying to a true GLES 3.x device later on will require no or minimal changes to the application.

trans-unit.source: This swap behaviour is sometimes used in order to decrease the risk of skipping a frame when the rendering rate is just barely keeping up with the screen refresh rate. Depending on the platform it might also lead to slightly more efficient use of the GPU due to improved pipelining behaviour. Triple buffering comes at the cost of an extra frame of memory usage and latency, and might not be supported depending on the underlying platform.
trans-unit.target: 这种交换行为有时会被用来降低当渲染率勉强跟上屏幕刷新率时跳过一帧的风险。根据平台的不同,它还可能会因为改进的流水线行为而使GPU的使用效率略高。三重缓冲是以额外的一帧内存使用和延迟为代价的,并且可能不被支持,这取决于底层平台。

trans-unit.source: This table shows the recommended data types for extracting data from the databases supported in Qt. Note that types used in Qt are not necessarily valid as input types to a specific database system. e.g., A double might work perfectly as input for floating point records in a particular database, but not necessarily as a storage format for output from that database, because it would be stored with 64-bit precision in C++.

This total angle measures the complete angle covered by the gesture. Usually, this is equal to the value held by the rotationAngle property, except in the case where the user performs multiple rotations by removing and repositioning one of the touch points, as described above. In this case, the total angle will be the sum of the rotation angles for the multiple stages of the gesture.
trans-unit.target: 该总角度测量手势覆盖的完整角度。通常，除用户如上所述通过移除并重新放置触摸点之一进行多次旋转的情况外，该值等于rotationAngle属性所保持的值。在这种情况下，总角度将是手势多个阶段的旋转角度之和。

trans-unit.source: This type allows you to capture still images and be notified when they are available or saved to disk. You can adjust the resolution of the captured image and where the saved image should go.

trans-unit.source: This type allows you to play uncompressed audio files (typically WAV files) in a generally lower latency way, and is suitable for "feedback" type sounds in response to user actions (e.g. virtual keyboard sounds, positive or negative feedback for popup dialogs, or game sounds). If low latency is not important, consider using the MediaPlayer or Audio types instead, since they support a wider variety of media formats and are less resource intensive.
trans-unit.target: 此类型允许您以通常较低的延迟方式播放未压缩的音频文件（通常为WAV文件），并且适合响应用户操作（例如虚拟键盘声音，弹出对话框的正反馈或负反馈）的“反馈”型声音。游戏声音）。如果低延迟并不重要，请考虑改用MediaPlayer或Audio类型，因为它们支持多种媒体格式，并且资源占用较少。

trans-unit.source: This type is a QML representation of QGeoCoordinate and represents a geographic position in the form of latitude, longitude and altitude attributes. The latitude attribute specifies the number of decimal degrees above and below the equator. A positive latitude indicates the Northern Hemisphere and a negative latitude indicates the Southern Hemisphere. The longitude attribute specifies the number of decimal degrees east and west. A positive longitude indicates the Eastern Hemisphere and a negative longitude indicates the Western Hemisphere. The altitude attribute specifies the number of meters above sea level. Together, these attributes specify a 3-dimensional position anywhere on or near the Earth's surface.
trans-unit.target: 此类型是QGeoCoordinate的QML表示形式，以纬度，经度和高度属性的形式表示地理位置。的纬度属性指定的上方和下方的赤道十进制度的数目。正纬度表示北半球，负纬度表示南半球。该经度属性指定十进制度以东的数量和西部。正经表示东半球，负经表示西半球。在海拔属性指定海拔高度的米数。这些属性共同指定了地球表面上或附近任何地方的3维位置。

trans-unit.source: This type is part of the XdgShellV5 extension and provides a way to extend the functionality of an existing WaylandSurface with features specific to desktop-style compositors, such as resizing and moving the surface.
trans-unit.target: 此类型是XdgShellV5扩展的一部分，它提供了一种扩展现有WaylandSurface功能的方法，该功能具有桌面样式合成器特有的功能，例如调整表面大小和移动表面。

trans-unit.source: This type is part of the XdgShellV6 extension and provides a way to extend extend the functionality of an XdgSurfaceV6 with features specific to desktop-style menus for an xdg surface.
trans-unit.target: 这种类型是的一部分XdgShellV6扩展和提供了一种延伸的延伸的功能XdgSurfaceV6与特征的特定桌面式菜单用于XDG表面。

trans-unit.source: This type is part of the XdgShellV6 extension and provides a way to extend the functionality of an XdgSurfaceV6 with features specific to desktop-style windows.
trans-unit.target: 此类型是XdgShellV6扩展的一部分，并提供了一种扩展XdgSurfaceV6功能的方法，该功能具有特定于桌面样式窗口的功能。

trans-unit.source: This type is part of the XdgShellV6 extension and provides a way to extend the functionality of an existing WaylandSurface with features specific to desktop-style compositors, such as resizing and moving the surface.
trans-unit.target: 此类型是XdgShellV6扩展的一部分，它提供了一种扩展现有WaylandSurface功能的方法，该功能具有桌面样式合成器特有的功能，例如调整表面大小和移动表面。

trans-unit.source: This type is the base for all path types. It cannot be instantiated.
trans-unit.target: 该类型是所有路径类型的基础。它不能被实例化。

trans-unit.source: This type is the root element of the keyboard layout. Use this element to build a new keyboard layout.
trans-unit.target: 此类型是键盘布局的根元素。使用该元素建立一个新的键盘布局。

trans-unit.source: This type is uncreatable, but contains properties that are exposed via subtypes.
trans-unit.target: 这个类型是不可创建的,但包含通过子类型暴露的属性。

trans-unit.source: This type is uncreatable, but contains properties that are exposed via the following subtypes: Bar3DSeries, Scatter3DSeries, and Surface3DSeries.
trans-unit.target: 此类型是不可创建的，但是包含通过以下子类型公开的属性：Bar3DSeries，Scatter3DSeries和Surface3DSeries。

trans-unit.source: This type is uncreatable, but contains properties that are exposed via the following subtypes: BarDataProxy, ScatterDataProxy, SurfaceDataProxy.
trans-unit.target: 此类型是不可创建的，但包含通过以下子类型公开的属性：BarDataProxy，ScatterDataProxy，SurfaceDataProxy。

trans-unit.source: This type is uncreatable, but it can be accessed by using the WebEngineView.navigationHistory property.
trans-unit.target: 此类型是不可创建的，但是可以使用WebEngineView.navigationHistory属性进行访问。

trans-unit.source: This type is uncreatable, but it contains properties that are shared between the 3D visualizations.
trans-unit.target: 这种类型是不可创建的,但它包含的属性是三维可视化之间共享的。

trans-unit.source: This type is uncreatable.
trans-unit.target: 这种类型是不可复制的。

trans-unit.source: This type is used to determine the direction of a box layout.
trans-unit.target: 这种类型用于确定盒子布局的方向。

trans-unit.source: This type is used to render wl_shell, xdg_shell or ivi_application surfaces as part of a Qt Quick scene. It handles moving and resizing triggered by clicking on the window decorations.
trans-unit.target: 此类型用于渲染 wl_shell ， xdg_shell 或 ivi_application 表面，作为Qt Quick场景的一部分。它可以处理通过单击窗口装饰触发的移动和调整大小。

trans-unit.source: This type is used to signify an object's orientation.
trans-unit.target: 该类型用于表示对象的方向。

trans-unit.source: This type is used to specify visual properties that affect the whole graph. There are several built-in themes that can be used as is or modified freely.
trans-unit.target: 这种类型用于指定影响整个图形的视觉属性。有几个内置的主题,可以按原样使用或自由修改。

trans-unit.source: This type is used when you need to enumerate months or weekdays. Usually standalone names are represented in singular forms with capitalized first letter.
trans-unit.target: 这种类型用于需要列举月份或星期的时候。通常独立的名称以单数形式表示,首字母大写。

trans-unit.source: This type is useful for keyboard layouts consisting of multiple pages of keys.
trans-unit.target: 这种类型适用于由多页按键组成的键盘布局。

trans-unit.source: This type manages the series specific visual elements, as well as the series data (via a data proxy).
trans-unit.target: 这种类型管理系列特定的视觉元素,以及系列数据(通过数据代理)。

trans-unit.source: This type of data can be alterable by an application program.
trans-unit.target: 这种类型的数据可以被应用程序更改。

trans-unit.source: This type of data can be provided by an I/O system.
trans-unit.target: 这种类型的数据可以由I/O系统提供。

trans-unit.source: This type of function should be used in conditional expressions only.
trans-unit.target: 这种类型的函数只能用在条件表达式中。

trans-unit.source: This type of function should be used on the right-hand side of assignments (that is, as an operand).
trans-unit.target: 这种类型的函数应该用在赋值的右侧(即作为操作数)。

trans-unit.source: This type of keyboard layout must meet the following requirements:
trans-unit.target: 这种类型的键盘布局必须满足以下要求。

trans-unit.source: This type of name can be used for date-to-string formatting.
trans-unit.target: 这种类型的名称可以用于日期到字符串的格式化。

trans-unit.source: This type provides a VirtualKeyboardSettings singleton instance, which can be used to configure the virtual keyboard settings.
trans-unit.target: 此类型提供VirtualKeyboardSettings单例实例，该实例可用于配置虚拟键盘设置。

trans-unit.source: This type provides a VirtualKeyboardSettings singleton instance, which can be used to configure the virtual keyboard settings.
This type provides an axis that can be given a range of values and segment and subsegment counts to divide the range into.
trans-unit.target: 这种类型提供了一个轴,可以给定一个值的范围,并将段和子段计数划分成范围。

trans-unit.source: This type provides an axis that can be given labels.
trans-unit.target: 这种类型提供了一个可以赋予标签的轴。

trans-unit.source: This type provides capabilities for rendering Trace objects on the screen.
trans-unit.target: 此类型提供在屏幕上渲染 Trace 对象的功能。

trans-unit.source: This type provides formatting rules for a linear value 3D axis. This type is the default type for ValueAxis3D and thus never needs to be explicitly created. This type has no public functionality.
trans-unit.target: 此类型为线性值3D轴提供格式设置规则。此类型是ValueAxis3D的默认类型，因此永远不需要显式创建。此类型没有公共功能。

trans-unit.source: This type provides notification when sensor gestures are triggered.
trans-unit.target: 该类型在传感器手势被触发时提供通知。

trans-unit.source: This type provides panel for decorating TraceInputKey items in the keyboard layout.
trans-unit.target: 此类型提供用于装饰键盘布局中的TraceInputKey项的面板。

trans-unit.source: This type provides simple QSettings-based storage for properties marked as PERSISTED. It is used in conjunction with Node::persistedStore:
trans-unit.target: 此类型为标记为PERSISTED的属性提供基于QSettings的简单存储。它与Node :: persistedStore结合使用：

trans-unit.source: This type represents a client connecting to the compositor using the Wayland protocol. It corresponds to the Wayland interface wl_client.
trans-unit.target: 该类型代表使用Wayland协议连接到合成器的客户端。它对应于Wayland接口wl_client。

trans-unit.source: This type should not be used directly in the layouts. The specialized key types, such as Key or EnterKey should be used instead.
trans-unit.target: 此类型不应直接在布局中使用。应改用专用的密钥类型，例如Key或EnterKey。

trans-unit.source: This typically includes a street number and street name but may also contain things like a unit number, a building name, or anything else that might be used to distinguish one address from another.
trans-unit.target: 这通常包括街道编号和街道名称,但也可能包含单位编号、建筑物名称或其他任何可能用于区分一个地址的东西。

trans-unit.source: This usage can be further optimized by using the insert() function in the case where the requested row is a long way from the currently cached items. If there is a gap between where the new item is inserted and the currently cached items then the existing cached items are first removed to retain the contiguous nature of the cache. Hence it is important to take some care then when using insert() in order to avoid unwanted clearing of the cache.
trans-unit.target: 如果请求的行与当前缓存的项目相距很远，可以通过使用insert（）函数进一步优化此用法。如果在插入新项目的位置和当前缓存的项目之间存在间隙，则首先删除现有的缓存项目以保留缓存的连续性质。因此，在使用insert（）时一定要格外小心，以避免不必要地清除缓存。

trans-unit.source: This usually matches the size of the window, but may also differ in case vkGetPhysicalDeviceSurfaceCapabilitiesKHR reports a fixed size.
trans-unit.target: 这通常与窗口的大小匹配，但是在 vkGetPhysicalDeviceSurfaceCapabilitiesKHR 报告固定大小的情况下也可能有所不同。

trans-unit.source: This value corresponds to a mask of all possible mouse buttons. Use to set the 'acceptedButtons' property of a MouseArea to accept ALL mouse buttons.
trans-unit.target: 此值对应于所有可能的鼠标按钮的遮罩。用于将MouseArea的'acceptedButtons'属性设置为接受所有鼠标按钮。

trans-unit.source: This value defines the format of the JSON byte array produced when converting to a QJsonDocument using toJson().
trans-unit.target: 此值定义使用toJson（）转换为QJsonDocument时生成的JSON字节数组的格式。

trans-unit.source: This value describes how quickly the spring-like motion comes to rest. The default value is 0.
trans-unit.target: 该值描述了类似弹簧的运动的静止速度。默认值为0。

trans-unit.source: This value determines how evenly and brightly the colors are shown throughout the graph regardless of the light position.
trans-unit.target: 该值决定了无论光照位置如何,整个图形中颜色显示的均匀度和亮度。

trans-unit.source: This value determines the depth of QGraphicsScene's BSP tree. The depth directly affects QGraphicsScene's performance and memory usage; the latter growing exponentially with the depth of the tree. With an optimal tree depth, QGraphicsScene can instantly determine the locality of items, even for scenes with thousands or millions of items. This also greatly improves rendering performance.
trans-unit.target: 该值确定QGraphicsScene的BSP树的深度。深度直接影响QGraphicsScene的性能和内存使用情况。后者随树的深度呈指数增长。通过最佳的树深度，QGraphicsScene可以立即确定项目的位置，甚至对于包含数千或数百万个项目的场景也是如此。这也大大提高了渲染性能。

trans-unit.source: This value does only have effect when the pen style is set to Qt::MiterJoin. The value is specified in units of the pen's width, e.g. a miter limit of 5 in width 10 is 50 pixels long. The default miter limit is 2, i.e. twice the pen width in pixels.
trans-unit.target: 仅当笔样式设置为Qt :: MiterJoin时，此值才有效。该值以笔的宽度为单位指定，例如，宽度10的斜接限制为5像素长。默认的斜接限制为2，即笔宽（以像素为单位）的两倍。

trans-unit.source: This value indicates imperial units, such as inches and miles as they are used in the United Kingdom.
trans-unit.target: 该值表示英制单位,如英国使用的英寸和英里。

trans-unit.source: This value indicates imperial units, such as inches and miles as they are used in the United States.
trans-unit.target: 该值表示英制单位,如美国使用的英寸和英里。

trans-unit.source: This value indicates metric units, such as meters, centimeters and millimeters.
trans-unit.target: 该值表示公制单位,如米、厘米和毫米。

trans-unit.source: This value is a multiplier applied to the media's standard play rate. By default this value is 1.0, indicating that the media is playing at the standard pace. Values higher than 1.0 will increase the rate of play. Values less than zero can be set and indicate the media should rewind at the multiplier of the standard pace.

This value is a multiplier applied to the media's standard play rate. By default this value is 1.0, indicating that the media is playing at the standard pace. Values higher than 1.0 will increase the rate of play. Values less than zero can be set and indicate the media will rewind at the multiplier of the standard pace.
trans-unit.target: 此值是应用于媒体标准播放速度的倍数。默认情况下,该值为1.0,表示媒体以标准速度播放。高于1.0的值将增加播放速度。可以设置小于0的值,表示媒体将以标准速度的倍数倒带。

trans-unit.target: 该值已被废弃。它相当于Unix上的ScreenResolution(屏幕分辨率)和Windows和Mac上的HighResolution(高分辨率)。由于ScreenResolution和HighResolution之间的差异,使用该值可能会导致打印机代码无法移植。

trans-unit.source: This value is either 1 when index type is GL_UNSIGNED_BYTE or 2 when index type is GL_UNSIGNED_SHORT. For Desktop OpenGL, GL_UNSIGNED_INT with the value 4 is also supported.
trans-unit.target: 这个值是 1 时索引类型是 GL_UNSIGNED_BYTE 或 2 时索引类型是 GL_UNSIGNED_SHORT 。对于桌面OpenGL，还支持值为 4 的 GL_UNSIGNED_INT 。

trans-unit.source: This value is normally below maxCost(), but QCache makes an exception for Qt's implicitly shared classes. If a cached object shares its internal data with another instance, QCache may keep the object lying around, possibly contributing to making totalCost() larger than maxCost().

This value is normally below maxCost(), but QCache makes an exception for Qt's implicitly shared classes. If a cached object shares its internal data with another instance, QCache may keep the object lying around, possibly contributing to making totalCost() larger than maxCost().
trans-unit.target: 该值通常低于maxCost（），但是QCache对于Qt的隐式共享类是一个例外。如果缓存的对象与另一个实例共享其内部数据，则QCache可能会将对象保留在周围，从而可能使totalCost（）大于maxCost（）。

trans-unit.source: This variable holds the object being styled
trans-unit.target: 这个变量存放被造型的对象

trans-unit.source: This variable holds the opacity of the target rectangle, where 0.0 is fully transparent and 1.0 is fully opaque.
trans-unit.target: 这个变量持有目标矩形的不透明度,其中0.0为完全透明,1.0为完全不透明。

trans-unit.source: This variable holds the option type of the style option
trans-unit.target: 这个变量持有样式选项的选项类型。

trans-unit.source: This variable holds the palette that should be used when painting the control
trans-unit.target: 这个变量保存了绘制控件时应该使用的调色板。

trans-unit.source: This variable holds the pixmap that is the best match for the given size, mode, state, and scale. This is an output parameter that is set after calling virtual_hook().
trans-unit.target: 该变量保存与给定大小，模式，状态和比例最匹配的像素图。这是在调用virtual_hook（）之后设置的输出参数。

trans-unit.source: This variable holds the popup rectangle for the combobox
trans-unit.target: 这个变量用来存放组合框的弹出矩形。

trans-unit.source: This variable holds the position of the decoration for the item
trans-unit.target: 这个变量保存了项目的装饰的位置。

trans-unit.source: This variable holds the position of the selected tab in relation to this tab
trans-unit.target: 这个变量保存了所选选项卡相对于该选项卡的位置。

trans-unit.source: This variable holds the position of the slider handle
trans-unit.target: 该变量用于保持滑块手柄的位置。

trans-unit.source: This variable holds the position of the slider's tick marks, if any
trans-unit.target: 如果有的话,这个变量保存了滑块的刻度线的位置。

trans-unit.source: This variable holds the position of the tab in the tab bar
trans-unit.target: 在标签栏中保持标签的位置。

trans-unit.source: This variable holds the position of the tool button
trans-unit.target: 这个变量保持工具按钮的位置。

trans-unit.source: This variable holds the position of the toolbar line.
trans-unit.target: 这个变量保持了工具条线的位置。

trans-unit.source: This variable holds the position of the toolbar within a line.
trans-unit.target: 这个变量保持了工具栏在行内的位置。

trans-unit.source: This variable holds the position within the document, where the cursor line should be drawn.
trans-unit.target: 这个变量保留了文档中光标线的位置。

trans-unit.source: This variable holds the rectangle containing all the tabs
trans-unit.target: 这个变量包含了所有标签的矩形。

trans-unit.source: This variable holds the rectangle containing the selected tab
trans-unit.target: 这个变量用来存放包含所选标签的矩形。

trans-unit.source: This variable holds the rectangle for the entire menu
trans-unit.target: 这个变量保存了整个菜单的矩形。

trans-unit.source: This variable holds the region for style hints that return a QRegion
trans-unit.target: 此变量保存返回QRegion的样式提示的区域

trans-unit.source: This variable holds the requested mode of an image.
trans-unit.target: 这个变量保存了图像的请求模式。

trans-unit.source: This variable holds the requested mode of the pixmap.
trans-unit.target: 这个变量保存了所要求的pixmap的模式。

trans-unit.source: This variable holds the requested scale of the pixmap.
trans-unit.target: 这个变量保存了所要求的像素图的比例。

trans-unit.source: This variable holds the requested size of the pixmap.
trans-unit.target: 这个变量保存了所要求的pixmap的大小。

trans-unit.source: This variable holds the requested state of an image.
trans-unit.target: 这个变量保存图像的请求状态。

trans-unit.source: This variable holds the requested state of the pixmap.
trans-unit.target: 这个变量保存了所要求的pixmap的状态。

trans-unit.source: This variable holds the reserved width for the menu item's shortcut
trans-unit.target: 此变量为菜单项的快捷键保留宽度。

trans-unit.source: This variable holds the right sample
trans-unit.target: 这个变量拥有正确的样本

trans-unit.source: This variable holds the rotation of the target rectangle in degrees. The target rectangle is rotated after it has been scaled.
trans-unit.target: 这个变量以度数来表示目标矩形的旋转。缩放后的目标矩形将被旋转。

trans-unit.source: This variable holds the section's position in relation to the other sections
trans-unit.target: 这个变量表示该部分相对于其他部分的位置。

trans-unit.source: This variable holds the section's position in relation to the selected section
trans-unit.target: 這個變數表示相對於所選的部分,該部分的位置。

trans-unit.source: This variable holds the selection's cursor
trans-unit.target: 这个变量保存了选择的光标

trans-unit.source: This variable holds the shape of the rubber band
trans-unit.target: 这个变量保持橡皮筋的形状

trans-unit.source: This variable holds the shape of the tab bar
trans-unit.target: 这个变量保存了标签栏的形状

trans-unit.source: This variable holds the size for the icons
trans-unit.target: 这个变量用来存放图标的大小

trans-unit.source: This variable holds the size for the left widget on the tab.
trans-unit.target: 此變數為標籤上左邊小工具的大小。

trans-unit.source: This variable holds the size for the right widget on the tab.
trans-unit.target: 此變數為標籤上右邊小工具的大小。

trans-unit.source: This variable holds the size of the decoration for the item
trans-unit.target: 这个变量用来存放物品的装饰品的大小。

trans-unit.source: This variable holds the size of the icon for the button
trans-unit.target: 该变量用于保存按钮的图标大小。

trans-unit.source: This variable holds the size of the icon for the tool button
trans-unit.target: 此變數為工具按鈕的圖示大小。

trans-unit.source: This variable holds the size of the left-corner widget
trans-unit.target: 这个变量保存了左角小部件的大小。

trans-unit.source: This variable holds the size of the page step of the slider
trans-unit.target: 这个变量存放了滑块的页面步长大小。

trans-unit.source: This variable holds the size of the right-corner widget
trans-unit.target: 这个变量保存了右角小部件的大小。

trans-unit.source: This variable holds the size of the single step of the slider
trans-unit.target: 这个变量保存了滑块的单步大小。

trans-unit.source: This variable holds the size of the tab bar
trans-unit.target: 这个变量用来存放标签栏的大小

trans-unit.source: This variable holds the slider control orientation
trans-unit.target: 這個變數表示滑桿控制的方向

trans-unit.source: This variable holds the slider's orientation (horizontal or vertical)
trans-unit.target: 这个变量用来存放滑块的方向(水平或垂直)。

trans-unit.source: This variable holds the state of the title bar
trans-unit.target: 这个变量保存标题栏的状态

trans-unit.source: This variable holds the style flags that are used when drawing the control
trans-unit.target: 这个变量保存了绘制控件时使用的样式标志。

trans-unit.source: This variable holds the tab shape used to draw the tab; by default QTabBar::RoundedNorth
trans-unit.target: 此变量保存用于绘制标签的标签形状；默认情况下QTabBar :: RoundedNorth

trans-unit.source: This variable holds the tab shape used to draw the tabs
trans-unit.target: 这个变量保存用于绘制标签的标签形状。

trans-unit.source: This variable holds the target url of the link.
This variable holds the text alignment for the text in the QProgressBar
trans-unit.target: 此变量保存QProgressBar中文本的文本对齐方式

trans-unit.source: This variable holds the text for the current item of the combo box
trans-unit.target: 这个变量存放组合框中当前项目的文字。

trans-unit.source: This variable holds the text for the menu item
trans-unit.target: 这个变量保存了菜单项的文字
